name: yowl
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a long, high, unhappy cry, usually when hurt or fighting: I was woken up by cats yowling outside my window. On the hills, the foxes yowled and yelped. Synonym
caterwaul
More examplesFewer examplesOutside in the road, a cat yowled.I keep hearing some kid yowling somewhere in the neighbourhood and thinking it's Sam.

Sounds made by humans with their mouths
a long, high, unhappy cry, usually made by an animal that is hurt or fighting: As he lifted her damaged leg the dog let out a fierce yowl. The squealing became slightly louder, and clearer - the yowls of an animal in pain. Synonym
caterwaul
More examplesFewer examplesI could pick out the high-pitched yowls of the pups.The family were concerned by loud yowls coming from their backyard every night.A strange plaintive yowl had curdled through the hushed wood.
